definition: Pierre Trudeau (1919-2000), prime minister of Canada 1980-1984 and 1968-1979/Justin Trudeau (1971-), prime minister of Canada from 2015
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Add an exciting flavor to your day, with Trudeau.
sentences.chinese: 新增一个令人兴奋的味道，你的一天，特鲁多。

sentences.english: But hey let's have Trudeau write an IQ test and see.
sentences.chinese: 但是让特鲁多进行智商测试，看看结果如何。

sentences.english: Trudeau's Set of 3 Measuring Cups neatly nests within one another when storing.
sentences.chinese: 特鲁多的3量杯内设置整齐巢彼此当存储。

sentences.english: By Trudeau, a company that develops visionary products.
sentences.chinese: 通过特鲁多，一个有远见的公司，开发的产品。

definition: Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Kevin Rudd (1957-), Australian politician, proficient in Mandarin, prime minister 2007-2010 and 2013
Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
Ivanka (name)
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
Modi (name)/Narendra Modi (1950-), Indian BJP (Bharatiya Janata Party or Indian People's Party) politician, Gujarat Chief Minister from 2001, PM from 2014
Vladimir Putin (1952-), president of Russia
president (of a country)/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2],屆|届[jie4]
Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
state visit
White House
Nursultan Nazarbayev (1940-), president of Kazakhstan
